org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget

Packages that use org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget
Package
Description
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.jsonforms.uischema
This package contains the implementation of the generation of an ui schema from DefaultNodeSettings.
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.setting.columnfilter
This package offers the ColumnFilter class used for settings holding a collection of selected columns.
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget
Use the Widget to set properties shared among all types of widgets and more specific annotations contained in this package for certain types of widgets.
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button
This package contains the additional widget annotations and classes to define widgets which trigger certain actions.

  • Classes in org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget used by org.knime.core.webui.node.view.table
    Class
    Description
    ChoicesWidget
    A widget supplied with an array of possible values, which are the choices for a selection.
    Hidden
    Annotate a setting with this to hide it from the dialog.
    NumberInputWidget
    Annotate a number setting with this in order to provide validation instructions.
    ValueSwitchWidget
    Annotate an Enum setting with this in order to display them as a value switch instead of the default (dropdown list).
    Widget
    An annotation for indicating controlling the common widget metadata of a given field.
